statements: SELECT * FROM ClimateChangeData;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM ClimateChangeData ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, temperature FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE humidity >= 50;
SELECT * FROM ClimateChangeData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20.0 AND 25.0;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE humidity BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 70 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, timestamp FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE temperature < 30 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateData;
SELECT date, temperature FROM ClimateData;
SELECT humidity, date FROM ClimateData;
SELECT ecosystem_name, ecosystem_id FROM EcosystemData;
SELECT temperature_tolerance FROM EcosystemData;
SELECT * FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, AVG(temperature) as avg_temp FROM ClimateData GROUP BY date HAVING avg_temp > 20 ORDER BY avg_temp DESC;

SELECT ecosystem_name, AVG(temperature) as avg_temp FROM ClimateData INNER JOIN EcosystemData ON ClimateData.temperature_tolerance = EcosystemData.temperature_tolerance GROUP BY ecosystem_name ORDER BY avg_temp DESC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM ClimateData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC, date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ClimateData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND temperature > 20 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY date ASC, temperature DESC, humidity ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM climate_data;
SELECT id, temperature FROM climate_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, species_name, population_size FROM ecosystem_data ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT id, analysis_date, analysis_type FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'Quality Control';
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_data WHERE population_size BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT id, analysis_type, result_description FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND analysis_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM ecosystem_data WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' OR habitat_type = 'Lake' ORDER BY species_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, timestamp, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY humidity DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM climate_data;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT id, impact_description FROM ecosystem_impact ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT analysis_type, results->>'average' AS average_result FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_type = 'Regression';
SELECT * FROM research_team ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM climate_data ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM climate_data WHERE humidity > 80;
SELECT location, impact_description FROM ecosystem_impact ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT team_name, research_topic, members FROM research_team WHERE team_name LIKE '%research%';
SELECT analysis_type, results FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT * FROM ClimateData;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT timestamp, location FROM ClimateData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Ecosystems WHERE region = 'Tropical';
SELECT team_name, lead_researcher, start_date FROM ResearchTeams ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT data_id, location, temperature, humidity FROM ClimateData WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT team_name, lead_researcher, members FROM ResearchTeams WHERE start_date > '2020-01-01' AND lead_researcher = 'John Doe'
SELECT ecology_name, region FROM Ecosystems WHERE climate_status = 'stable'
SELECT grant_name, amount FROM Funding WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY grant_name ASC
